title: Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun 2 - Holiday Beach Party
description:
NEW!  Hatch surprise eggs and collect the cutest pets!

Join the Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for girls and boys! Spend your summer at the beach near the ocean with Sweet Baby Girl and her friends. Here every day is a beach party! From animal care and ocean cleanup to cooking and beauty makeover, these girls have many plans for this summer.

There's a new surprise in town! A magical place where cute little animals hatch from surprise eggs! Collect them all and dress them up in stylish pet clothes!

Girls always take their pet pony on holidays! Take care of this cute little horse: clean it up and make a beautiful hairstyle!

Oh no! A little pink dolphin got tangled! Rescue it and dress it up in cute ocean outfits!

It's makeover time! Mix and match cute clothes, experiment with hairstyles and do fancy manicure!

Become a chef! Grill some yummy hot dogs, make delicious ice cream and mix frozen rainbow beach party slushies! 

Sweet Baby Girl and her friends are planning a summer boat party but the ship is a mess! Clean up the boat, paint it pink and get ready for the best boat party!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kids’ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

Important Message to Parents
This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Discover More Fun with TutoTOONS!
· Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/tutotoonsofficial
· Learn more about us: https://tutotoons.com
· Read our blog: https://blog.tutotoons.com

title: Summer Liv Cam™ 2.0
description:
The Summer Liv Cam™ APP requires the purchase of the Summer Liv Cam™ on-the-go wireless camera. The Liv Cam allows monitoring of baby through live audio and video streaming via your mobile device. Wifi/cellular service not required. Smart device connects directly to your camera. 

Download our APP and begin live viewing access of your loved ones on your phone or tablet!

FEATURES: 
EASY SETUP – APP WALKS YOU THROUGH SIMPLE CAMERA SETUP AND ACTIVATION, HASSLE-FREE
SECURE CONNECTION TO ENSURE PRIVACY
VIEW AND HEAR YOUR BABY FROM ANYWHERE IN YOUR HOME OR ON-THE-GO
AUTOMATIC BLACK AND WHITE NIGHT VISION
UNIQUE ONE-MINUTE REPLAY ALLOWS YOU TO VIEW & SHARE BABY’S CUTE & FUNNY MOMENTS
SNAP PHOTOS – TAKE A PICTURE ANYTIME. PICTURES ARE SECURELY STORED ON YOUR PHONE. SHARE WITH FRIENDS & FAMILY!
RECORD VIDEOS – RECORD A VIDEA ANYTIME. PICTURES ARE SECURELY STORE ON YOUR PHONE. SHARE WITH FRIENDS & FAMILY!
NO DATA CHARGES

This APP requires the purchase of a Summer Liv Cam™

title: Hannah's High School Summer Crush - Teen Date
description:
OMG, Jack asked Hannah on a new date! Help her get ready for a beach date with her high school crush Jack. Turn Hannah into a beauty queen with tons of makeup tools, fancy summer hairstyles and fashionable clothes for girls!

Hannah's boyfriend Jack plans a romantic date at the beach. Hannah is very excited and needs your styling skills to look like a beauty queen tonight. Join the makeover squad with Hannah's best friend Jessica, create stunning makeup looks, colorful hairstyles and amazing outfits. Get the hottest summer crush game for girls, enjoy new beauty makeover adventures, style, design and become a part of a high school love story. Play now and find out if Hannah and her boyfriend Jack’s romantic beach date ends with a kiss!

Hannah's High School Summer Crush makeover games for girls and teens:
· Follow Hannah and her high school crush Jack's love story to the seaside this summer!
· Help Hannah become a beauty queen on a romantic beach date with her boyfriend Jack!
· Do flawless makeup, style hair and polish nails at the beauty salon with Hannah's best friend Jessica!
· Mix and match girly dresses, shoes and accessories for the hot summer fashion look on a beach date!
· Meet Jessica's new boyfriend JP and have fun at the beach party with friends!
· Set up a magazine cover photoshoot and become a superstar this summer!
· Learn new dance moves and dance with Hannah and her boyfriend Jack all night long!
· Pick a perfect swimsuit, sunbathe and have a refreshing swim in the sea with Jessica!
· Play beauty makeover games every day, collect coins, diamonds and unlock new levels!
· Watch rewarding videos and get bonus coins for exciting game items!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: Summer Vacation - Beach Party
description:
Summer vacation is almost here! It's time for a fun-filled day with tons of HOT beach activities! Dress up in stylish beach clothing, care for injured beach animals, find surprises in the sand & so much more! Build the most beautiful sand castle & enter the sand castle competition! Vote for your favorite castles!

Help the Johnsons get ready for their fun summer beach vacation ! Dress them up in fabulous beach attire & accessories - they'll tell you exactly what they want to wear! You can even design your own surfboard! Grab your beach bag, rub in your sunscreen, & let's get going! There's no better way to spend a hot summer day!

Features:
> Meet the Johnsons - your favorite beach-loving family!
> Ouch! Treat the Johnsons’ beach injuries with real doctor tools!
> Dress up the Johnsons’ for their vacation! Tons of beach clothing & summer vacation accessories!    
> Build a magnificent sand castle! Enter the sand castle competition & see if you win! 
> Care for sick dolphins & trapped seals with real doctor tools!  
> Make yummy popsicles to snack on at the beach!
> Design & decorate your very own surfboard!
> Choose from tons of trendy bathing suits, sunglasses, floaties & more! 
> Design summer jewelry with beautiful sea shells! 
> Shop for beach accessories & fun toys in the in-game Beach Shop!

title: Beach Party Craft: Summer High School Adventure
description:
Sleep all day, PARTY ALL NIGHT! Enjoy holidays break on summer high school vacation camp in a paradise! Bay watch won’t stop you from being a beach party king at the hottest beach on Earth! Music, dancing, crafting & building!

Time for a summer high school adventure!
Imagine a paradise island: warm nights, hot beaches, cute girls and handsome boys… It’s all here in Beach Party Craft! Experience an unique mix of crafting & building games with fashion games, music games and dancing games! Start your high school music adventure with crafting & building your own world (from blueprints!) or look for fun in the paradise island of Beach Party Craft! Sea adventure begins!

Are you ready for the hottest beach party on Earth?
Beach Party Craft isn’t only about crafting & building. It’s one of the best party games, but before you go wild like a party animal, make some preparations! Go shopping and change your clothes - it’s not a fashion runway, but not a pool party too! Dress up, add some makeup, visit nail salon and spa, look for famous hair salon of Coco. Games for girls are usually plain simple, but Beach Party Craft isn’t! If you want to amuse your best high school friends, boyfriend or girlfriend, you MUST dress up like a star. Dancing queen or king is going to be yours!

Enjoy the nightlife
In Beach Party Craft you will find other party fun fans! Meet with friends from high school or last dorm party, then chat with your high school crush! But don’t waste your time on some high school romance like in many casual games for girls. Instead, look for single boys and girls - craft your own love story. Find a hip hop dancing queen like Elsa or a disco girl of your dreams like Nikki. Have fun in the theme park and become the best friends or maybe even a girlfriend and boyfriend!

Sea adventure awaits
Tired of beach party? Build yourself a fishing boat or… a glamorous yacht! Launch the sea safari and invite your high school friends or even a… mermaid! Craft, build and design - make the best yacht party on the ocean! Craft the best vacation ever - only in Beach Party Craft!

The hottest beach on a paradise island and the hottest beach party in the fashion world awaits in Beach Party Craft! Crafting & building games meet music games and dancing games in one of the best of casual games for girls of 2020! This vacation you just can’t miss this summer camp. Sit back, relax and DRESS UP your mobile phone with the best beach game for girls and boys! FOR FREE!

title: Summer Sports Events
description:
Compete in your very own summer sports games and take home the gold for your country! The most celebrated sports event of the world is now in the palm of your hand!

Select your favorite national team and participate in 40+ different sports events against thousands of athletes from all over the world. Enjoy simple yet challenging competitions including athletics events, shooting events, cycling events, swimming events and tennis, basketball, football, badminton, and many more! Victory and glory can be yours!

Game Features:
- 40+ different sports events in legend mode and tournament mode
- Stunning 3D graphics, cut scenes and animations 
- Realistic physics and intelligent AI opponents

title: Summer
description:
Add fun summer-themed content to your photos and videos with the Xperia AR effect application.

Watch a summer beach scene unfold in your view finder, and take cool pictures with a surf board on an azure water front, chill-out under a beach umbrella, or flex your muscles to create memorable photos and videos.

Sony's FACE RECOGNITION Technology and SmartAR* Engine automatically detect faces and 3D environments and decorate them with fun AR items.

To interact with AR items:
1. Tap on 3D objects to change
2. Drag 3D objects to reposition them

NOTE:
This theme requires a version of the AR Effect app v3.3.13 or higher.

*SmartAR is the registered trademark or trademark of Sony Corporation in Japan and other countries, for the augmented reality technology developed by Sony Corporation.

This application uses analytics software to collect and aggregate statistics to help us improve this app and our services. None of this data can be used to identify you.

title: Sweet Baby Girl Summer Camp - Holiday Fun for Kids
description:
Join Sweet Baby Girl in this new summer holiday camp game for girls! Explore super fun summer holiday activities and play the cutest girl games. Dress up and style hair for Sweet Baby Girl, clean up and design your dream camping car, make lemonade, cook s'mores and go kayaking with other kids!

Play the best games for girls in your dream summer camp with Sweet Baby Girl and friends! Mix and match girly clothes and dress up for the summer holidays. Get creative with fun summer hairstyles: wash, brush, cut and style hair. Clean up and decorate girls' camper and go kayaking with your best friends in the river. Make fresh fruit lemonade and roast super sweet marshmallows over a campfire. Play summer kids games with Sweet Baby Girl and have the best summer holidays for kids!

title: Summer Pockets
description:
2018年夏に発売され涙が止まらないと話題となったＰＣゲーム「Summer Pockets」がスマホアプリになって登場！
「サマポケ」の愛称で親しまれている泣きゲーを、あなたのポケットの中へ！

＜Summer Pockets（サマーポケッツ）とは＞
少年時代の思い出というのは、どれも大切で、大事にしまっておきたいもの。
ポケットというのは、そんな思い出をしまう小さな宝箱のような物でした。
「夏の小さな宝箱」そういった意味合いを込めたタイトルです。

泣きゲーというジャンルを確立させたKeyによる、最新にして懐かしさを感じる物語。
ＰＣ版発売以降、寄せられたは「懐かしすぎて泣いた」「感動した」「こんな夏休みを過ごしたい」
といった、心を震えさせられたという多数の賞賛の声。

海に囲まれ多くの自然が残る島には、懐かしさで満ちあふれています。
大人なら、自分の子供時代のことを思い出すでしょう。
子供なら、こういう時代があったんだなと、未知の体験に変わるでしょう。

Summer Pocketsはそんな「夏休み」の物語です。


＜あらすじ＞
亡くなった祖母の遺品整理のために夏休みを利用して鳥白島にやってきた主人公の鷹原羽依里。
祖母の思い出の品の片付けを手伝いながら、初めて触れる「島の生活」に戸惑いつつも、順応していく。
海を見つめる少女と出会った。
不思議な蝶を探す少女と出会った。
思い出と海賊船を探す少女会った。
静かな灯台で暮らす少女と出会った。

島で新しい仲間が出来た――

この夏休みが終わらなければいいのにと、そう思った。


＜ＰＣゲームレコード＞
【萌えゲーアワード、2018年6月発売タイトル月間賞受賞】
【Amazon売れ筋ランキングPCソフト＞PCゲームランキング連続12週1位】※売り切れ時除く
【Amazonカスタマーレビュー115件 星4.7】
【DMM GAMES アドベンチャー（全年齢向け）ランキング 連続16週1位 】
【ソフマップドットコム ＰＣソフト＞アドベンチャー ランキング1位継続中】※売り切れ時除く



※本アプリにはミニゲーム（卓球ゲーム・島モンファイト）は収録されておりません。
※追加のゲームデータをダウンロードするため 3.3GByte 以上の空き容量が必要です。

title: Athletics2: Summer Sports Free
description:
Practice athletic sports in a realistic 3D environment through 30 events and 5 competitions ! 
Challenge the computer or play against friends to beat records all around the world ! 

Are you ready to take on the best in the world ? 
__________________________________ 

30 SINGLE EVENTS and 5 COMPETITIONS 
"Athletics 2: Summer Sports" allows to play 12 athletics events, 4 shooting events, 4 cycling events, 6 swimming events and many more, all in sharp 3D graphics. 

REALISTIC GRAPHICS 
"Athletics 2: Summer Sports" immerses you in an authentic atmosphere. You will evolve through detailed and realistic environment with animations to celebrate your records. The game includes music and special crowd sound effects. 

GAMEPLAY 
Athletics Summer Sports provides an intuitive gameplay system for both beginners and experienced players. It requires fast fingers, impeccable timing, and smart strategy to defeat your opponents and claim a medal. 

SPECIAL 2 PLAYERS MODE IN SPLIT SCREEN 
Challenge your friends on the same screen with split-screen feature. 

30 NATIONALITIES 
Go head to head against 30 athletes from USA to Australia ! 

SINGLE EVENTS: 
-100 Meters 
-110 Meters Hurdles 
-400 Meters 
-4x100 Meters Relay 
-1500 Meters 
-Javelin Throw 
-Long Jump 
-Discus Throw 
-High Jump

title: Restaurant Story: Summer Fun
description:
The #1 FREE virtual restaurant game returns with Restaurant Story: Summer Fun!
Decorate a Restaurant to celebrate the wonderful warm season, and share with your friends! Celebrate the outdoors and sunshine with your customers with fun, delicious decorations and tasty summer-themed treats!  Leave them coming back for more and bringing their friends to stuff their appetites to welcome the summer season!

- DESIGN and build the perfect, personalized Restaurant! Stunning variety and unlimited creativity! 
- DECORATE with thousands of items, choose tables, chairs, wallpaper, art, and more! 
- CUSTOMIZE a menu of delicious meals that make tummies grumble for more! 
- SOCIALIZE with other restaurants, and collect bonus tips from players! 
- INVITE friends to set up shop right next door! Share secret recipes! 
- FREE to download, FREE to play, FREE weekly updates with new dishes and decorations!

Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is the BEST looking, FREE to play, most delicious restaurant game for your Android device!

Please note: Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

Please note that Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use   password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup.  In addition, Restaurant Story: Summer Fun may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android. 

Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy.

Leave them coming back for more and bringing their friends to stuff their appetites to welcome the summer season!

- DESIGN and build the perfect, personalized Restaurant! Stunning variety and unlimited creativity!
- DECORATE with thousands of items, choose tables, chairs, wallpaper, art, and more!
- CUSTOMIZE a menu of delicious meals that make tummies grumble for more!
- SOCIALIZE with other restaurants, and collect bonus tips from players!
- INVITE friends to set up shop right next door! Share secret recipes!
- FREE to download, FREE to play, FREE weekly updates with new dishes and decorations!

Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is the BEST looking, FREE to play, most delicious restaurant game for your Android device!

Please note: Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

Please note that Restaurant Story: Summer Fun is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. In addition, Restaurant Story: Summer Fun may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android.

Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy.

comments: I've loved playing this game on the many devices I've owned over the last half decade or so but the knew phone I have has the latest updated software, so with the game it's too outdated for my device causing me to not get notifications when my food is done causing my food to burn. It would be nice if the developers could update this game even if that hope is a long shot. Love the game though!

I would rate the game higher because it is fun, but I am disappointed with the makers. Every level you're supposed to be able to buy a oven/stove/ect to help make your resturant bigger and complete goals. I haven't been able buy one every level it just keeps reading unlock next level. There were 4 levels straight I wasn't able to. I downloaded it onto another device same story. I went to their help center and got a generic response. There are more issues that they didn't help with.
The game is ok.it would be great if we had a way to earn gems.even greater if we could get ovens when we wanted as long as we can afford it.
it use to be a fun game but you have to wait to long to go to the next level. you have to request to many parts and you dont have enough time. it's just not fun anymore

I tried contacting through email twice and no response. It said my ticket has been closed. Like everyone else is saying about the notifications please fix. We need them in order to see if our food is done. I'm pretty sure you are aware of the issue. Please fix thank you.

title: High School Summer Vacation Fun
description:
Simulate the world with kid’s summer camp adventure in high school summer vacation game and travel back in time of school life games. Enjoy lots high school trip summer vacation fun activities in your summer holidays and give yourself some relaxation from your busy school routine. There are many summer activities for school kids like sand castle building, tent camping, woods collection, bonfire, swimming, fishing etc. like you do in swimming games, fishing games in this summer break game. Make your summer vacations life simulator and summer days full of fun by playing school summer vacation fun games. Camping is always fun for kids, play in and enjoy the beauty of nature in your holidays. Relish your high school trip in high school simulator summer camping. If you like summer school transportation or summer camp transportation games, then this summer camp is a best game for camping for girls & camping for boys.

Are you ready to enjoy and make fun in summer school camping games? Play High School Summer Vacation Fun Game from google store. Relish navigating the high school bus to vacation land. Drive the speedy high school bus to pick and drop students on time. Avoid all obstacles and keep an eye on timer to reach destination on time. Let’s have some fun with summer camp love & tent camping.

Run and find your school friends and best friends in this vacationland and play summer games & summer camp island games or other kids games, running games you play in your school playground. There will be many surprises and adventures in this camping game. Summer holidays kids will surely enjoy summer kid’s games like summer vacation fun game.

Uncover the city picnic environment and take kids around the beach but don’t let them go deep into the water. Be quick and fast to complete the summer activities and trip tasks in summer vacation games. Beach picnic and vacation games are loved by kids but this game includes summer vacation family trips, summer beach fun vacation, summer break & camping fun. Must play it in your free time to get enjoyed kids summer camp adventures.

title: Internet Baby Monitor
description:
Summer Infant Internet Viewable Monitoring System
Peek in on your baby anytime, anywhere with the all new Internet Baby Monitoring System by Summer Infant. With the Internet Baby Monitoring System and an Android phone or tablet you always have access to see your baby when you are not there. Great for working parents, long distance family
members and friends! Simply log-in with your secure unique user name and password and voila! Your baby becomes the main attraction on your Android phone or Tablet.


FEATURES:

-VIEW and HEAR the camera set-up in your home direct from your Android phone.

-VIEW in both landscape and portrait mode SNAPSHOT tool allows you to capture photos that store to your android phone.

-SHARE secure username and password login with family and friends.
*note max of 3 users are allowed at one time

-TIME OUT feature will notify you after 5 minutes of viewing

-LOG OUT at anytime when finished viewing

This app requires the purchase of a PeekPlus, Peek, or Connect Internet Viewable System.

*May work on Tablets but is not optimized

http://peaceofmind.summerinfant.com

comments: Times out or crashes all the time. Annoying when I want to keep an eye on my daughter while she's napping. I can't even take a quick shower without it closing, requiring me to get out and log back in again. Update: took it down to one star because now it says camera is offline. I have restarted my phone, the camera, and the link. I can't even get it open for 5 seconds to check on her. I'm done with this brand!

I don't know how this app is even available. Someone at Summer should've realized it's tarnishing whatever reputation they still have. So many issues. I somehow got it working on my old phone after a lot of fiddling but can't get it working on my new phone. Says login/password incorrect and sends me to the website, where I can login perfectly fine with the same credentials. Go figure. Support (hah!) is useless and unresponsive. Don't sell a product with a WiFi feature that you can't support!
I can't connect in my account. Show me invalid password or username, but in web site I can log in.

Use to work when it was New !!! Now the site doesn't even allow download for android and the app don't update. I have the correct email and password because when I made the account I wrote it on the instructions book just in case !!! But apparently the email and password is wrong lol ... not possible at all never changed it because we wanted to keep it easy

The only app for their camera they have turned off the app requiring you to buy an expensive dedicated handheld device. In other words you can no longer use the cam for viewing/using with your phone, Their device can only be used in the next room. This is extortion.

comments: It's. One of the best games it has the athletic theme and it is Lit love it put wi. Fi of when to many adds and it is fine and I am enjoying the game so much and I play it every day and I find it really. Really enjoyable keep making the good games and I love the music of the game really really good please make so good games as this Thank you for such a good game

Love the game. But the ads at the bottom of the screen are so annoying. I try to close them but it just says ad closed by google with the options of report the ad or why this ad. But I love the game. Please look into removing those. I would be more happy with actual ads. Not ones at the bottom of the screen that are annoying.
It's a great pass time game I'd just wish you could choose certain events to play over and over again and also please add more events to play on..

I actually really like the game but it is a bit repetititive.After a while,I found that the game was not as fun as when I first dowloaded it. The game is all about timing.The timing aspect is fun but can get boring after a while. I think that you guys can put new sports into the game(swimming ) and put new controls so that players wont get bored of the timing aspect.The new "controls" can be that you have to move your finger as fast as can to make the guy swim fast.Hope that you can do this.

Ads popping up is no surprise on a free app. However, there shouldn't be ads that pop up during actual game play, that's just lame and in poor taste. The game requires frequent tapping so if you're playing and all of a sudden an ad pops up, you end up clicking the ad essentially ruining your experience. Ads between game play? Fine, but not during, please.

title: Mermaid Secrets17 – A Mermaid Summer Pool Party
description:
Mermaid Secrets17 – A Mermaid Summer Pool Party
Mermaid Princess Mia was invited to a summer pool party. Mermaid Mia dressed up and make up for this pool party. What will happen for princess at sea in this crazy party? Be the mermaid princess and find the answer in our mermaid game. 

Mermaid Games Features:
1. High school teacher Mrs. Blake is so curious about mermaid princess Mia’s real identity. Are mermaids real?
2.Mrs. Blake invites mermaid girl Mia to attend a pool party. What will she do in this summer pool party? Will she reveal a mermaid's secret?
3.Part girl Mia promises that she will attend the crazy party on time. Now prepare for the mermaid princess makeover!
4.Wow, mermaid princess Mia dress up and plan to have a nail salon. She will be shiny in the summer pool party!
5. Mermaid girl  Mia manicures her princess nail. Let’s enjoy the nail spa in mermaid games for girls.
6.This summer theme party should be interesting and full of summer fun in mermaid girl games.
7.Wow, the pool is so beautiful and tropical. Will bikini girl Mia have a leisure summer time?
8.Mrs. Blake, a high school teacher, is putting some banana peels in the pool. Will mermaids drown into the summer pool?
9.Mermaid princess Mia comes to the pool but no one is here. What happened in this crazy pool?
10.SOS, bikini girl Mia is slipping into the swimming pool. Is there any summer doctor who can save the drowned mermaid girl? 

Enjoy the most impressive summer fun with mermaid princess!Be the real mermaid princess and enjoy the underwater adventure.Download the mermaid makeover and mermaid games for girls Now!

title: Miami Beach Coach Summer Party
description:
Miami Beach Coach Summer Party
Drive open roof car.Show off your hottest moves and Keep the party sizzling
Oh my goodness! Join the most loving couple Jack and Ellie at the beach dancing party. Show your perfect steps and dance moves and keep the party rocking in Miami Beach Coach Summer Party simulator. Enjoy beach party Miami 2016. Drive open roof luxurious car to the beach. Pick Ellie and go away to enjoy dance party music. Turn on your disco mode, get ready to dance at beach party events. Enjoy sunrise resort holiday trip in Car, Water Boat, and Coach and visit the magnificent eye catching tourist spot.

❤ ❤ ❤ Party of the Century !!!
Summer's finally here! You’re invited to the hottest party of the summer. Play with interactive animated characters. Make a trip to the beach and fun in the sand. Roll up your sleeves and delight in summer beach party. Feel the realistic beach environment with Volleyball area, Great rapid Motor boat and Grand ocean. Enjoy sunbathe at deckchair and make sure you’re tanned with sun rays. Experience rich animations to engage in Miami Beach Coach Summer Party at Miami beach - a hot summer beach party. It’s getting hot out and you’re about to throw the party of the century!
Show off your hottest moves. Practice the sense of real rhythm and keep the party sizzling.
Accelerate your dancing convertible to embark Miami beach journey. Enjoy beach party music, and let’s dance with beach girls. Along with simulating cabriolet, steer the boat helm also and sail your ship as being the skipper. In next stages drive Coach to join girls party while playing Miami Beach Coach Summer Party.

☆ Rock for the Step up history !!! ☆

title: Summer wallpapers
description:
The application with summer wallpapers is a good way to embellish your phone. The wallpapers are of the highest quality Ultra HD and 4k. Downloadable, set as wallpaper on the screen or as a screen lock. The application with a lot of photos from the summer gives you the chance to find something for yourself.

Why our application with summer wallpapers?

- High quality legal photos, all wallpapers are legal and we have the rights to them.
- Wallpapers automatically matching your screen.
- All summer wallpapers are compatible with 16: 9, 18.5: 9 screens.
- Wallpaper database frequently updated with several gradations.
- New summer wallpapers are available in the "New summer wallpapers" section and a notification is sent to users about the addition of new summer wallpapers.
- Wallpapers compatible with popular phone brands such as BlackBerry, HTC, Alcatel, Nokia, - Samsung S8, s9 and others, Sony Xperia, LG, Xiomi, ZTE, Motorola, Lenovo.
- Simple application operation through an intuitive menu.
- Setting "summer wallpapers" with one click.
- A large summer wallpaper base, gradually moderated and added to the application.
- Allows you to personalize your phone.
- wallpapers in various styles like modern, industrial, glamor, vintage etc.
- Frequent actions on suggestions and suggestions in the comments on Google Play
- Limited amount of ads in a free application with summer backgrounds
- Framing summer wallpaper
- The ability to save wallpapers in the device's memory
- Adding your "favorites" to the database
- Shares selected backgrounds with friends using social media accounts, MMS or email
- Free application
- Supports any Android device regardless of its version

Adding up, simple operation of the Application with summer wallpapers, high quality 4K wallpapers, in an amount that allows everyone to find something for themselves. We invite you to test the application - Summer Wallpapers.

description:
It's hot! Oh it's a HOT Summer! Don't you feel like you're missing something? Something totally Icy? Something totally FROZEN?? That is Snow Cone. Our Snow Cone Princess could offer you the magic Snow Cone in our newly released app - Snow Cone Maker.

This sweet frozen dessert is really hit the spot. When the heat rises, cool yourself off with an icy and yummy snow cone! Sit back and relax this hot summer with snow cone maker. Those who crave for yummy and icy snow cones to fulfill their sweet tooth will love making their own snow cone.

Let's start from making the ice cubes. You can choose the ice shapes you like. Play a puzzle game to win your snow cone shape. It's so fun to design your own cones with tons of colors, stickers, and even you can draw whatever you like on your cone. What a nice creation. Want to have sweet yummy syrups? They are freezed by the ice. Use the brush and the hammer to get them out. Choose multiple flavors and put it with ice. 

Decorate your snow cone with fruity toppings, sprinkles, sweet candies and other tasty things. Wow, look at the creation you made, you are a talented frozen food chef now. Enjoy your summer frozen dessert and show your yummy icy snow cone to the best friends. 
Wow, you are the best summer frozen dessert chef. Enjoy hours of fun making and decorating.


Features:
- Be a real summer sweet frozen dessert chef.
- Make the ice with kinds of molds.
- Design the best cone with tons of decorations.
- Play mini game to get the shapes and mutiple flavors.
- Design your icy delight with tons of super cool decorations.
- When you're finished, take a picture and share your yummy hot summer treat.
- Fun hot summer icy dessert theme.


For more cooking games, visit our official site at http://www.makerlabs.net/
Any new idea or suggestions to our game? Please follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/The_MAKER_LAB

title: Summer Vacation Planning - Family Trip Game
description:
Everyone loves to enjoy summer vacation. Mostly all the people plans trips or relaxing activities for summer vacation. So GameiMake has made this game on the concept of summer vacation planning.

So Guys, Its time to learn & plan for going to vacation in summer time. Some people like to spent some quality time with friends. They do some fun activities like watching movies, playing video games, enjoying bone fire at late night, etc. Then you can learn how to schedule for summer vacation planning. In the vacation trip most important thing, you need to consider is your stay. You need to clean room using different tools. If you are planning for any beach destination then you can perform beach tasks like cleaning the beach, sand castle making and have some tasty beach food. If you are planning for a night out then better get you guest list ready. After that, You can arrange summer house party, swimming pool party and movie party. In swimming pool party, you need to select all swimming pool decoration, provide food for guest, capture photo shoots etc. After having superb vacation planning, you should rest at home and perform some entertaining activates like watching movies and book reading.

Features

- Learn to plan for your summer vacations
- Fix the seats and clean the theater
- Purchase movie tickets
- Beautiful backyard Decoration
- Yummy and tasty snacks available
- Perform running gaming exercises
- Bring funny beach toys

About GameiMake

GameiMake brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by family. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for family. Stay with us for the latest updates of GameiMake on Google play and get more of educational games.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZQYvjuDzMiK9OraEerUu_w

title: Teenage Style Guide: Summer 16
description:
Alert! Teen fashion lovers should be on the lookout for the newest trends and styles! 2016 means that the latest summer styles are coming out. Are you ready to explore the collection?
Teenage Style Guide is a fashion and lifestyle app that allows you to experiment by mixing and matching makeup and clothing to find your desired chic look in the palm of your hand!

EXPRESS YOUR UNIQUE STYLE! 
Learn about the style guide by going through the catalogue 
Start with some makeup makeovers
• Dress up in the newest summer fashions
• Create your own fashion lookbook collection to share with your friends
Be in the know with all the latest fashion trends

Indulge in the extensive selection that comprises ready-to-wear fashion. Get your wardrobe essentials: basics such as tank tops and trousers, killer shoes like heels and must-have accessories such as sunglasses and watches. Summer is finally here! We have added a cute collection of bathing suits, bikinis and beachwear. Try out all of them!

Fashion and high school have always seemed to go together great. Now college is coming up fast. Take some time to pamper and prep yourself to look great. Find some amazing new summer looks for 2016 and share them with your friends. They will be amazed by your fashion sense!

Check out our Facebook for MORE! 
https://www.facebook.com/Bluebell-Lush-Interactive-Limited-114974758911799

title: Summer Girl Game : Camping Life Simulator
description:
Summer Girl : Camping Life
Summer is almost over but do you want to relive or enjoy the summer a little longer? Play this summer holiday game with six minigames! This summer girl went on a vacation at a camping! Have fun with her at the camping and when she is back home. Search for bikinis, make ice cream, clean up your tent en help gardening at the camping. When you come back home there is ofcourse a lot of laundry to do! Help your mum doing the holiday laundry with all your cute summer clothes. 
Camping is always a lot of fun for kids, play in and with the nature and have fun with other kids on the camping. Swimming in the pool, sea or a river or sunbathing. Playing outside and inside the tent and make a mess and clean it up. And of course eat a lot of ice cream! Make your own ice cream and decorate it with fruits and sprinkles.


Summer Girl : Camping Life with six fun summer holiday mini-games:
❤ Do the after holiday laundry: sort colors from the white clothes and use the right detergent for your pile of summer clothes laundry!
❤ Hang the laundry: Make sure the summer clothes dry properly by matching the right shapes!
❤ Match the bikinis: All the bikinis are lying on the floor. Can you help me matching the right bikini tops with the right bikini bottoms?
❤ Clean up the tent: make the air mattress, put the books and cute toys back in the right place and clean the rest of the tent!
❤ Go gardening at the camping: Help the summer girl plant and water the most adorable flowers!
❤ Make ice cream: Choose the fruit that you love most and put the right ingredients together! When you are done making and freezing you can decorate your ice cream!


Summer Girl : Camping Life is a game from Top Girl games and one of the summer camp games. We publish many different easy to play girl games apps. We hope you will enjoy our Summer Girl : Camping Life and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter or Instagram. . So we can keep you up to date on our summer holiday and decoration games.
★ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp
★ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup
★ Instagram - https://instagram.com/TopGirlGames

title: Happy Cooking 2: Summer Journey
description:
The best of cooking games and girl games you ever seen! Happy Cooking 2 is ready to lead another wave of cooking fever!

Cook and serve tasty food in this NEW FREE cooking games and girl games! Build the restaurant of your dreams, use your secret chef recipe, and serve tasty meals to your customers! Create your own Kitchen Chef Story! From dessert, ice cream, to steak and pasta, to exclusive seafood meal, what’s your secret chef recipe?

Friendly to new chef players, and challenging to the seasoned chef players. Happy Cooking 2: Summer Journey will bring you the best cooking experience to every crazy chef!

Let the cooking journey begin! 

 New Dressing System
- Brand new fashionable dress waiting, It’s all your choice in this girl games!
- Fashion wear, or just transform to a mysterious witch chef and serve fantastic soup of youth! 
- Each fashionable dress has it's unique attribute bonus.

 New Food Recipes
- Hundreds of delicious ingredients to cook for meals.
- Ice cream, steak, lobster, seafood, Sushi,  more summer food waiting for you to cook.
- Upgrade ingredients to manage best cooking restaurants!

 New Challenges and Targets
- More rewards, much more fun! 
- Serve the customers quickly to reach dishes requirement.
- Keep the customers happy and get more tips .
- Earn as many coins as you can to upgrade the kitchen and ingredients.
- Unlock more restaurants to learn top class cuisine.
- Manage your time to cook tasty food and do not burn them!

Open Restaurant And Cook, Anytime, Anywhere
- No wifi, no problem.
- Enjoy time-management cooking games anytime.
- Create your own Kitchen chef cooking journey story

If you like cooking games and girl games, play Happy Cooking 2. If you want to be the best chef, play Happy Cooking 2. If you want to be the master of girl games, play Happy Cooking 2! You will love it!!!

Multiple strategies, tips and cooking skills, upgrade the food and kitchen in a smart order, or just show every girl around you who is the master of the kitchen! It will be a real cooking challenge!

Have fun with cooking games and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends!

Download NOW for FREE! What are you waiting for? Download Happy Cooking 2: Summer Journey, the best cooking games and girl games in 2019! 

Enjoy Happy Cooking 2: Summer Journey and thanks for playing!

title: Fix It Girls - Summer Fun
description:
~~> The Fix It Girls are back with an exciting summer project - to fix up the POOL! 
~~> Help the Fix It Girls give these broken down homes a summer makeover! Fix up pools, decorate rooms, add furniture and so much more! 
~~> Fix a new house and pool every day! Earn prizes and upgrade the houses as you play! 

What’s summer without a pool?! Help the Fix It Girls bring summer to the neighborhood by using your creativity and eye for design to fix up the pool along with the rest of the house! Clean, repair and decorate every room in the house to make them look brand new and beautiful! Fix up electric appliances, refurbish old furniture, choose from tons of paint colors and more! Earn beautiful additions to each room as you fix them up! Together, you can fix anything!

Features:
> New houses and pools to fix every day! Each house is packed with tons of real-life fixing activities! 
> Choose from 5 rooms to decorate in each house - the kitchen, living room, kids bedroom, bathroom and toilet! Don’t forget to fix up the POOL! 
> Design rooms as you like - choose colors, customize furniture and more! 
> Use professional construction tools like hammers, screwdrivers, wire cutters & more!
> Earn upgrades as you fix up the homes and pool; decorate the homes with your upgrades! 
> Wow! Look at that sparkling mirror you just fixed! Take a selfie;)
descriptionHTML:

Clean, repair and decorate every room in the house to make them look brand new and beautiful! Fix up electric appliances, refurbish old furniture, choose from tons of paint colors and more! title: Everlasting Summer
description:
Meeting Semyon, the game's main character, you would've never paid attention to him. Just an ordinary young man with thousands, even hundreds of thousands of those like him in every ordinary city. But one day something completely unusual happens to him: he falls asleep in a bus in winter and wakes up... in the middle of a hot summer. In front of him is "Sovionok" - a pioneer camp, behind him is his former life. To understand what happened to him, Semyon will have to get to know the local inhabitants (and maybe even find love), find his way in the complex labyrinth of human relationships and his own problems and solve the camp's mysteries. And answer the main question - how to come back? Should he come back?

Conrols – swipe screen:
– Up to open game menu.
– To the right to enable skipping.
– To the left to open text history.
– Down to hide the interface.

Attention! After the update you may experience some problems with the saves you made earlier.

If you've experienced a bug, please send us (mail@everlastingsummer.su) the content of these files: /sdcard/Android/data/su.sovietgames.everlasting_summer/files/traceback.txt and log.txt along with the description of the error.

comments: The story itself is good. I played it on the computer and got it for that reason. The mobile controls, however, are really bad. The swiping mechanic sometimes confuses a swipe with a click, which makes quick saving difficult at times. The save page gives you 12 saves per page, but the load page only recognize 9 of the 12 save slots. BE WARY OF THIS if you save and load often. Overall, its a good game with wonky controls.

The soundtrack is amazing. The characters are beautiful each in their own way. The art is awesome. I love this game so much. Played it on PC and it's literally my favorite game of all time. Has a free sequel called Frosty Kiss. Only play that after you get every ending for everlasting summer though.

Stuck on day 2 at the map. Can't select anything, the only thing I can do is open the menu/log. (Edit: found a Steam thread about the same issue. Restarting the game and retracing my choices did get it working, though it still would be great if someone managed to fix the bug.) The load screen has one column missing (the saves aren't moved to the next screen, they're just unavailable).

I normaly state if I like the game or not but due to the sheer awesomeness of this game a simple "I lIkE iT" won't cut it. Firstly the music is amazing and perfectly conveys the emotion characters are feeling wether it be tranquil or terrorfied. The story begins with a massive hook out of nowhere that leaves you deeply intrigued throughout your gameplay. The characters are unique from one another in terms of character types, personalities, and desighn. That combined with the many endings, 10/10.

It was good, for what i managed to play, i would get to a point where I'd be given the option to choose a destination on the map, but nothing works and nothing is highlighted. Only when restarting the game it works, but once i got the second time to choose a destination it was the same problem, i refuse to restart the game each time I'm given the map screen, please fix this asap and I might download the game again

title: Flick Champions Summer Sports
description:
Get in the sporting mood this summer with Flick Champions Summer Sports. Featuring nine classic tests of human endurance including, Running, the Hammer Throw, Javelin, Kayaking and more! Put your fingers to the test in this dose of addictive sporting fun! Prove you are the champion once again!

GOLD MEDAL WINNING FEATURES
• Nine sports to play; Boxing, Running, Volleyball, Handball, Kayaking, Hammer Throw, Javelin, Swimming and Synchronized Swimming.

• New Championship mode lets you take on the ultimate test with increasingly tough sporting challenges.

title: ❤ Vacation Summer Dress Up ❤
description:
Six girl friends spend their summer vacation / holidays together. They travel, sunbathe, swim in the sea and visit cool places. These young fashionistas also love to go shopping and buy all kinds of dresses and other clothes in foreign countries to show off back home. These amazing girls are the coolest and the most beautiful ladies in their town!

Just have a look at the nice selection of gorgeous dresses, hats, handbags and shoes they've bought!

In the morning they usually have a cup of coffee in some cozy little cafe. Dress the girls up in their new summer dresses or skirts! After that they go swimming. Pick a swimming suit and a pareo for the occasion! Hair got wet and all messed up - time for a new hairstyle and a walk across Old Town, to boutiques and fashion clothing shops.

In this dressup game about summer holidays / vacation you can even set the tan level of the skin. The longer girls spend their time in the open sun, the darker their skin gets.

Everyone loves summer, vacation and beautiful sea beach resorts! A holiday is especially fun if your cool girl friends are with you! 

All our dress up games are completely free and offer no in-app purchases. "Vacation Summer" has as many as 225 items (18 categories) to choose from, all free. We bet you'll hardly find any dress up games for girls with such variety and friendliness to players. Follow the "More by Games For Girls" link to download even more similar makeover games by our studio on other topics!

title: Hair Fashion Summer Girl Salon
description:
Summer is fast approaching and this cute girl needs your help to pick the coolest hair style! 

Start by taking your girl to the hair salon for a fashion forward makeover. Wash, cut and style her hair into all kinds of different looks. Pick from a short bob, long locks or a crazy punk style. Use all sorts of hair styling implements like curling irons and flat irons. Don’t forget to add a fun color and highlights! 

When her gorgeous hair is styled, head to the makeup counter to try on a fun summer look. Apply bronzed blush, golden eyeshadow and natural lipstick. Or go wild with the colors of the rainbow! The choice is up to you! 

Finish her look by choosing a cool outfit for her summer vacation. Pick from lots of different bathing suits, shorts and t-shirts in tropical themed styles. There are lots of vibrant colors and floral prints to ring in the arrival of summer! Top off the look with chunky jewelry and heat-friendly sandals. She’s sure to shine this season! 

Product Features:
- Summer themed backgrounds and clothes
- Choose from tons of different hairstyles, colors and highlights
- Add necklaces and earrings to finish off the summery wardrobe

Make like the sun and shine in this fun summer makeover game. 

How to Play: 
- Tap to choose outfits, accessories and hair styles
- Swipe to apply cosmetics in the stylish salon
- Follow the steps to make all kinds of cuts and styles at the beach salon

title: High School Kids Summer Vacation Adventure
description:
Welcome to High School Kids Summer Vacation Adventure and get ready to enjoy the high school trip game during summer holidays to relax from the busy school life. It’s the summer break time and your school is arranging an adventurous tour. Make your summer vacations full of fun with your school friends and teachers by playing adventure games and celebrating picnic parties. Travel through mountains and hilly areas to enjoy nature’s beauty. If you love to play high school games, you must play high school summer vacation simulator to enjoy camping in the summer holidays.
 
Virtual High School Kids Summer Vacation Adventure is the best picnic game for the boys and girls to celebrate the school summer break. Are you ready for the high school trip? Pack your camp, food items, first aid kit and fill the oil tanker of your jeep before starting picnic adventure. Explore nature during the summer vacation adventure and fully enjoy the summer days camping. Play hide and seek and other summer fun games with schoolfellows and teachers on the picnic spot. Inform your teacher if you got injured and need any first aid. Enjoy the rainy day

title: Baby Panda’s Summer: Vacation
description:
Search for "BabyBus" for even more free panda games for you to try! 

Summer vacation is finally here, and for kids thinking of where to plan  summer vacation getaway, Babybus brings a gorgeous vacation resort for you to soak up the sun and sip a cool drink. Let's go! Your awesome vacation is about to start! Enjoy your summer vacation and do whatever you like at this beach resort with our baby panda!

HOTEL CHECK-IN 
Enter the number of occupancy days, select your bed, pay your deposit, complete the check-in process yourself, learn a new skill with ease! Yes, you can take a vacation relax here now!

CREATIVE BUFFET 
In baby panda’s vacation resort, all the food choices are yours! Make the hot dog as you want. Add cucumber or tomato? Ice cream or watermelon juice? It’s up to you!

SEA SURFING
Sharks appear occasionally. Click on the screen, jump and avoid. Can you react quickly? Experience the thrill of surfing the waves. Hang on until the finish!

SANDCASTLE BUILDING
Want to know the secret to build a great sandcastle? Baby Panda's Vacation has all tools and beautiful decorations. Work to design your castle and plan the decoration.Then create your best sandcastle ever with baby panda.

FEATURE:
-Seaside Scenery: the blue sky, the vast sandy beaches, a luxurious hotel...It’s a vacation destination of your dreams;
-Vacation Games: Sandcastles, surf the waves, hotel check-in, packing-up, buffet, the vacation fun never ends!
-Tons of Items: 20+ interesting items including shovels, red flags, suitcases, cameras and more! Which one will be your favorite?
-No Limits: Design your own sandcastle, there's no rules or restrictions!

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Little Girl Summer Vacation: Beach Fun & Adventure
description:
Little Girl Summer Vacation provides you an opportunity of a lifetime to have fun on family trip. Mommy & daddy are planning to spend their best summer vacations time at some of beautiful beach resorts outside the town. They will have to do packing, deciding for resorts to visit, washing their car and arrangement of money. It has been a long time when they visited outside during summer vacations.  Be happy at the moment performing multiple fun tasks at the beach. From sand castle making, hot dog cooking, mixing fruit salad to boat makeover will give you fun to design and decorate.

It’s just the start of your high school vacations and you have planned a big surprise for your friends & family. It was always a dream trip to visit the cool sandy beaches in high school trip simulator game for girls but now is the time to travel the world! Dress up in stylish traveling clothes, pack your luggage, find surprises while performing multiple beach fun activities & so much more! Your food cooking skills along with fresh fruit salad making will come in handy here. Prepare & cook delicious fast food burger along with cutting juicy fruits to make awesome looking salad. Afterwards, renovate your old rusty boat before the party in the ocean begins. 

Crazy chef! Help the travelers getting ready for their fun high school adventure in Little Girl Summer Vacation! Serve delicious icy slushie to your friends in this scorching heat at the beach! Rescue the octopus who is struggling in muddy waters & wires. Cute them and perform some care activities to save the cute fish. There's no better way to spend a hot summer vacation traveling around the world beaches & other must seeing spots!

Fill buckets with sands to make a sandcastle on the beach. Decorate it with various accessories available in your luggage. Design your luxury yacht ship in a pleasant way to attract maximum people to the party.  Serve them hot dog burgers with slush juice at the bar. Have unlimited fun in this summer vacation games for girls which is available free offline.

Little Girl Summer Vacation features:

-	Repair your boat for beach party
-	Cook & bake awesome food for fun
-	Make juicy icy slush for friends
-	Make & decorate princess sand castle
-	Rescue octopus in the ocean

title: Summer Catchers
description:
Embark on an epic road trip adventure of a lifetime in Summer Catchers. With your trusty wooden car you must travel to distant lands full of mystery, strange creatures and exciting races in your quest to finally experience summer.

However the journey won't be easy. Driving through shadowy forests, dark swamps, vast valleys and underground cities you will encounter obstacles and larger than life situations. With your trusty travel bag in hand, you can work your way through these uncharted lands and just like in real life, find a few friends and secrets along the way.

Key Features:
- A unique arcade game that mixes racing, story, rhythm and puzzle elements all into one
- Uncover all the mysteries and events of this beautiful pixel art world
- Discover unique abilities and upgrade your car to ride in style
- Replay the game to find all the hidden corners the fast traveller might have missed

comments: Cute graphics with nice music, bad gameplay. Swiping through your abilities while obstacles are coming at you (while they are being partially obscured by the selection interface) is frustrating and just plain stupid. The whole random selection system of powerups in your inventory at any given time is also probably the most annoying mechanic I have ever seen in an endless runner!

Very great game! I like how it is an endless runner but it isnt at the same time, like it has progression. The little changes in gameplay such as puzzles and rhythm mini games was cool too. I loved the characters you encounter and I was always anxious to see what happened next.
Looks really good, but gets horribly annoying to play after the first world. It's honestly rage inducing, and not worth any price tag at all.

A really good game, with beautiful graphics. Definitely a great time killer. Currently having an issue on the xylophone part. My game crashes when I try to play it. If that gets fixed I would definitely give a 5 star.
Fun at first but I reached a part where you are supposed to get bat guano and it is impossible. I stop and honk my horn like it says but the little circle never fills up. Very frustrating.

title: Athletics 2: Summer Sports
description:
Practice athletic sports in a realistic 3D environment through 30 events and 5 competitions ! 
Challenge the computer or play against friends to beat records all around the world ! 

Are you ready to take on the best in the world ? 
__________________________________ 

30 SINGLE EVENTS and 5 COMPETITIONS 
"Athletics 2: Summer Sports" allows to play 12 athletics events, 4 shooting events, 4 cycling events, 6 swimming events and many more, all in sharp 3D graphics. 

REALISTIC GRAPHICS 
"Athletics 2: Summer Sports" immerses you in an authentic atmosphere. You will evolve through detailed and realistic environment with animations to celebrate your records. The game includes music and special crowd sound effects. 

GAMEPLAY 
Athletics Summer Sports provides an intuitive gameplay system for both beginners and experienced players. It requires fast fingers, impeccable timing, and smart strategy to defeat your opponents and claim a medal. 

SPECIAL 2 PLAYERS MODE IN SPLIT SCREEN 
Challenge your friends on the same screen with split-screen feature. 

30 NATIONALITIES 
Go head to head against 30 athletes from USA to Australia ! 

SINGLE EVENTS: 
-100 Meters

title: Summer Countdown
description:
Celebrate the season of pool parties, backyard barbecues, and late-night bonfires with our favorite summer pins. Make sure to check out all the fun , refreshing activities, and kid-friendly games that are perfect for warm vacation days, as well as a collection of delicious recipes that are just dying to be thrown on the grill.

          Summer and warmer weather are right around the corner and let me tell ya, I cannot wait. Summer is the most amazing time of the year. No school, warm weather, outside activities, and did I mention NO SCHOOL. There are multiple opportunities to do all of the things. All of the outside activities, all of the people to see, all of the things to eat. I feel like nothing negative, with the exception of always having to shave my legs, comes from summer. There are 15 things that I love when it warms up outside and when summer comes around. Let me tell ya about them.

title: Icy Summer Food Maker
description:
On a hot  summer day, there is nothing better than yummy icy food!  Come and join Summer icy food truck in which you can enjoy tasty frozen food like snow cone, ice candy, Mock tails, frozen slushy and much more. 


Beat the hot summer by eating yummy summer food. There is lots of frozen food  to make in this summer food maker game. In this frozen food maker we have include six different  icy food recipe just for you.


1. Frozen Slushy

Make your own virtual fruit slushy without the mess ! Here lots of different fruit flavors  are available to make the frosty slushy. just add ice, sweet fruits and flavors and then blend it and add your favorite toppings, your frozen slushy will be ready within a minute. 

2.Snow cone

A perfect hot summer dessert food. Make mouthwatering snow cone with different colors and different shapes. Beat the heat and be relax with this snow cone maker. 


3.Milkshake

All your favorite milkshake in this one dessert food maker game. Make vanilla milkshake, strawberry milkshake or add two flavor and make one delicious milkshake. Here more than 20 different flavors to make frozen milkshake. 

4.Ice Candy

Make your virtual ice candy with the cone of ice candy and the juicy fruit stick of popsicles. Use different juicy food flavor to make ice cream popsicles

5. Ice Cream

Make delicious ice cream with this ice cream maker game. Choose your favorite flavor and start making yummy mouthwatering ice cream. 

6. Mocktail

A best drink for heat the summer, take one or more flavor of fruit and mint and make mock tail in this kitchen cooking game. 


Beat the heat by playing Summer Icy Food Maker in this summer vacation. Enjoy real cooking fever in this kitchen cooking game for girls. 


======
Features
=======

* Summer Dessert  Food Maker game for girls and kids.
* 6 different recopies on this Summer Food Truck.
* Be a little chef and make yummy icy food for your friends and    family.
* Lots of different flavors and toppings for your summer food.
* Share your creation with your friends.


Download this  Icy Summer Food Maker game and stay cool in this hot summer!

title: Happy Family Summer Vacation Adventures
description:
Are you ready to play Happy Family Summer Vacation Adventures in happy family games? Get your hands set on happy family virtual adventure and play as a super hero to make happy family home. Summer vacation are started now and kids are ready to enjoy the trips in happy family game 3D. Super mom and dad are planning to spend their best summer vacation time at a beautiful resort on the hill station. So, get ready for happy family fun at the resort in happy family life game & summer vacation family game. Start packing your luggage, deciding for resorts to visit, washing their camper van and arrangement of money in happy family simulator. It has been a long time when they visited a trip on hill station during summer vacations for family adventure. Kids are so much happy at the moment with happy family mother. Busy dad has just arranged some money from his friend and the Mom is going for shopping to supermarket . Experience the camper van driving as a great driving simulator. They started their journey, visited multiple resorts and shoot memorable places in summer vacation games. It was a great summer vacation trip when kids will enjoy summer vacation beach party. Get your hands set on camper van driving simulator to take a perfect start of your resort trip. Play different camper van driving games but Happy Family Summer Vacation Adventures is different in the famous category of Google Play. This summer vacation at resort game will help kids to have some sort of knowledge in planning trips while playing camper van beach resort games. After all family & kids total time fun loving summer vacation game for kids. 

Experience Happy Family Summer Vacation Adventures while playing summer vacation games & camper van games. Summer vacation is almost here! It's time for a fun-filled day with tons of resort activities! Dress up in stylish beach clothing, care for injured kids, find surprises in the sand & so much more! Build the most beautiful sand castle & enter the sand castle competition! Vote for your favorite castles. Help the kids to get ready for their fun summer beach vacation ! Dress them up in fabulous swimming pool attire & accessories - they'll tell you exactly what they want to wear. Super mom is making food for the whole happy family. Get ready the for the family adventure while taking lunch in resort. There's no better way to spend a hot summer day. Drive offroad truck and camper van  through rv caravans around crowded campsites and hilly areas to become offroad driver in latest Camper Van Driving Simulator. Make amazing memories with your happy family by arranging amazing night parties in the resort or make different photographs with your family and new friends.

Features of Happy Family Summer Vacation Adventures
- Spectacular gameplay with multiple levels 
- Realistic 3D environment and multiple camping car
- Amazing HD graphics with super cool sound effects
- Detailed camper van for summer vacation trips

title: Summer Beach Super Fun Holidays
description:
Summer Beach Family Holidays is a real adventure game for girls on these upcoming summer holidays. We are getting ready  to travel around the world for making their summer holidays more memorable and stunning. In western countries there is deficiency of Vitamins D and parents want to enjoy the summer holidays at beach side to get more vitamins in their body. Feel the fun of Ice Cream making and decoration on beach side ice cream shop. Mom hand made ice cream will give you a nice taste. Let’s get ready for the beach dressUp for safety reasons. Collect the jewelry, make sandcastles, sand made houses, madhouses and treat the seaside injured turtle. Wear the sun glasses, summer shirts, caps and play with football on seaside sand.

Beach activities  …!!!!

* Make drinks and ice cream from different fruits
* Beach Art and mud houses with sea shells
* Relay Race & sand castles
* Explore the tide pools
* Beach Yoga & beach mermaid with sand
* Build a sand man and make pictures or selfies
* Beach ball relay game & create sand animals
* Beach ball toss and musical towels
* Create a beach tent
* Organize a family sport like olympics
* Create beach tic-tac-toe
* Beach Skee ball sand game
* Create Sand darts game

You can consider the possibilities of camping near the beach. You can visit someone in your family of friends circle who lives by the beach. With your family you can visit to tropical island and book a resort stay. You can pack the plenty of beach activities things like swimsuits, flip flops sandals, t-shirt and light weight jacket, sunscreen, insect repellent , aloe vera or after sun cream for sandbank party. You may enjoy some night parties on the beach like a large bonfire and throw a party. Take photos in sunrise and sunset over the beach. Visit the local restaurants , cafes and beach bars.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !

title: Mahjong Solitaire: Summer Blossom
description:
Put your sunglasses on, summer is here in Mahjong Summer Blossom! Play 100s of mahjong solitaire puzzles, collect stunning artwork, craft treasures, rescue animals and much more. With more levels added regularly and tonnes of awesome features to enjoy, the mahjong solitaire fun never stops!

----------------------------------------------------------------
MAHJONG SUMMER BLOSSOM - HIGHLIGHTS
----------------------------------------------------------------
⦁ Classic mahjong solitaire rules with a summer theme
⦁ Easy to understand gameplay suitable for all ages
⦁ Helpful hints are always available when you need them
⦁ Match tiles on an epic mahjong solitaire journey with over 100 levels
⦁ Rescue and evolve your pet! 
⦁ More maps, features & levels added every month!
⦁ Normal and challenging expert modes for mahjong solitaire experts
⦁ Bonus levels with various ways to play
⦁ Collect Mahjong Summer Blossom artwork, save & use as a HD background
⦁ Complete dark dungeon levels in each map to earn HUGE rewards
⦁ Free daily rewards & coins for active players
⦁ Each level uses its own unique themed tile sets
⦁ Replay each level as many times as you like to earn more coins
⦁ Earn coins to unlock more exciting mahjong solitaire boards
⦁ Play mahjong offline, no wifi needed! 

★ Fun, Relaxing & Casual Mahjong Solitaire 
We’ve designed our puzzles to be relaxing and fun, suitable for players of all skill levels – whether you’re a mahjong solitaire expert or a beginner! All of our puzzles are always solvable so you can sit back, relax and enjoy the game without worrying that you’ve made the wrong move and made the puzzle impossible. 

If you ever get stuck, hints are only a tap away!

★ Collect & Craft Rare Treasures
As you go on your mahjong solitaire adventure you’ll discover ancient, rare artifacts. Collect all the crafting tiles for an artefact and you’ll be able to craft it – keep your treasures or sell them for gold coins, it’s your choice! At the end of each level, you’ll also be able to open a bonus treasure chest. What could they contain? There’s only one way to find out!

DOWNLOAD TODAY & EMBARK ON A MAHJONG SOLITAIRE ADVENTURE!

comments: The levels cost too much.Too many videos for coins. Mskes it boring

The game itself is excellent. It deserves five stars, however, you are bombarded with adverts. Even if you choose to watch an ad to gain extra points, you are faced with another unwanted ad before you can return to the game. Game developers rely on ads to support their work, but this is really excessive and irritating.

I have always loved all the games by Difference Games but this one is by far my favorite! Beautiful artwork you can download & use for your phone or PC background. With all the different elements of the game, it is never boring. I would recommend it to anyone who love mahjong like I do☺️

Warning! This app is addicting! Don't start playing too early in the day. Before you know it, it'll be dark outside. Seriously, it's got so many levels and you spend more time collecting bonuses than watching the very short ads. I love the puzzles and the expert bonus challenges. My only problem is the look alike faces are too small and I haven't been able to complete one yet. But I'll work on it. Great app!
This game is fun, challenging, and addicting! I just wish the seasonal tiles stayed in the correct season's app (i.e., the Summer game has Christmas stockings and Jack-o-Lanterns).

title: Happy Family Summer Fun Virtual Life Adventure
description:
Winter has just ended and now it’s New Year 2018’s family fun time which has some Summer adventures with your virtual life Happy family. Virtual mom and virtual dad are ready with the holiday Trip camping on sea beach and between the mountains and uphill area. Offroad Camper van truck is ready out there so be quick virtual girl and virtual high school boy for Vacational camping fun. Get ready for campground with virtual family 2018. Pack your tent and food items and drive your camper van truck between the ice covered snowy mountains and in the middle of Oceans. In virtual life happy family Summer Fun : adventure 3D Game, caper the magnificent view of shining blue sea as you pass through dizziness inducing Oceanside routes. With virtual life happy family Summer Fun : adventure 3D Game 2018 it’s time to relax with your loved ones and celebrate the holidays. Best family simulator in the category of virtual mom games and virtual dad games.

Play with multiple family members as per demand of the mission. Become a virtual mom and make food in hill camping or beach camping. Before going on a Summer vacations you need to pack your stuff, fix and clean the camper van. Virtual dad is having fun with his guitar and virtual girl is playing and making sand castle with beach sand. This ultimate happy family game is all about micromanagement and multi-tasking activities during holiday hill camping on campground. Immerse yourself and your Friends into the greatest winter and Summer camping adventure Activities and prepare yourself for long term weekend travel. Enjoy fun activities during the camping and having a great Christmas holidays camping! Play with your siblings. Your task is to keep the family happy in the cold Summer weather with virtual family simulator.

Gameplay/Features in Virtual Life Happy Family Summer Fun : Adventure

✓ Drive camper van truck on offroad hilly area & through dizziness inducing Oceanside routes.
✓ Prepare tent on campground for holiday camping family fun.
✓ Be a mom or dad & virtual 3d high school girl in virtual family games.
✓ Different fun packed household & outdoor activities missions.
✓ Realistic 3D graphics with amazing sound effects.

You have various surprise events during the gameplay. Complete a succession of missions to complete a level. Download virtual life happy family Summer Fun : adventure 3D Game and have a great family fun time on this New Year by beach and hill camping. Have fun in this Summer vacation camp game.

title: Summer Fruit Juice Festival
description:
Hello Friends! Are you thirsty? In this summer season satisfy your thirst and re-energize your body with some cold refreshing juice recipes. Open up your own Fruit Juice shop in Summer Fruit Juice Festival and have some sweet drinks for this summer. In this game we've included Six types of Juice to make and serve. This juice maker game is the place where you will learn how to make milk shakes and juices using different ingredients.

To make sweet delicious fruit juice, you've to choose the fruit van in level selection screen. We've more than six plus fruit juice available to make in this game like Kiwi, Blueberry, Water Melon, Grapes, Mango and Chikoo. Select your favorite fruit and cut it with knife and put it into mixer jug then add milk and sugar. Put jug on the mixer grinder and your juice is ready to drink. Now select your glass and pour the juice from jug to glass. It's time to decorate your glass with tons of decorative items like Straw, Stickers and fruit. Hurray!! You can share picture of ready juice glass with decoration to your friends and family using social media tools. Show off your fruit juice making skill to your friends now!!

title: Ragdoll sport games: summer events
description:
Take control of your clumsy sportsman and get ready to laugh a lot playing summer sport events.This is ragdoll game! So just drag your finger to make your player do things on a stadium.

Play the following sport games right now.
Steeplechase - drag and run with 2 competitors. Shooting - shoot target with pistol and hit bullseye. Diving - jump in a pool and get high judge ranks for landing. Cycling - bicycle game with "stunt bike" mechanics with amount of different levels. Pole vault - run and jump with help of stick. Long Jump - drag, drop your jumper and measure. High Jump - the same but the altitude is in prior. Hammer Throw - drag and throw with your maximum  power. Javelin Throw - same like hummer but with javelin.

Ragdoll sport games is a pack of nine sportive mini games. You're provided with opened player customizing options with nice cartoon graphics and sound. Each sport game has its leaderboard where you can challenge with players all over the world.

We are planning to expand game list and add new awesome fun game modes. Feel free to contact us with your cool suggestions!

title: Summer Live Wallpaper
description:
Summer landscape live wallpaper - amazing animated screen saver for your Android phone or tablet. It is an inspiring story of a wonderful trip on a sunny day on the shore of a mountain lake. In the lush green grass grow a myriad of beautiful flowers and fly over them slowly bright butterflies. In the sky clouds float slowly and light breeze brings refreshing coolness of the mountains. Softly creaking windmill creates an indescribable atmosphere of harmony. Watch how snowy peaks of the mountains reflects in the surface of the lake. Feel all the beauty of the summer in the mountains.

Key features:
- Beautiful summer mountain landscape in the background
- Falling animated leaves of trees
- Animated dandelion seeds
- Interactive falling flowers (6 kinds to choose from)
- Animated clouds and flying bird
- Soap bubbles, which burst from your touching the screen
- Low battery consumption (economical sleep mode when the screen is off)
- A large number of settings and configurations
- Wallpaper looks great on smartphones and tablets (landscape mode), supports scree auto-rotating mode (screen rotation)

How to set this free summer screen saver on the home screen of your phone: Home → Applications → Settings → Display → Wallpapers → Home screen wallpaper → Live wallpapers → Summer live wallpaper

Check out our account for more free cute live wallpapers

Notice: this free android app contains ads

title: Lewis County Summer
description:
Capture your favorite hike or four-wheeling adventure and share it with your friends! Come explore all the scenic beauty and outdoor magnificence that is at your fingertips within Lewis County!

Our app includes all you need to find outdoor, family fun or a taste of the past. Use the waypoint feature to mark a favorite spot to remember and return to another time. Once downloaded, the Lewis County Summer app works without cell reception. Enable GPS and know where you are at all times relative to the abundance of trails throughout the County.

Be sure to take advantage of all these features:
- ATV, Hiking, Horseback, Road and Mountain Biking trails
- Golf courses, Parks, Playgrounds and Waterfalls
- Local Businesses for Shopping, Dining, Lodging and more
- Conveniences including ATMs, Wi-Fi locations, Libraries, Campsites, Parking, Boat Launches and Info Kiosks
- Cultural and Historical Offerings
- Fishing, Swimming and Waterways for Still and Whitewater paddling
- Maple Trail
- Capture breadcrumb tracks, save and share
- Display your family and friends’ tracks in your app or in Google Earth
- Mark and save favorite spots as waypoints
- Street, Satellite or Topo map view
- Display weather radar (reception required)

REMEMBER: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. Please be prepared.
Come discover the peaceful, friendly surroundings of one of the most beautiful regions in New York, no matter the season!
For more information, visit AdirondacksTugHill.com or contact the Lewis County Chamber of Commerce at 315-376-2213 or 1-800-724-0242 or email info@lewiscountychamber.org.
