title: My Summer Palette
description:
==================================
Please note this app is not fully supported. We recommend using our newer app called My Best Colors. Along with other new features, it comes with a set of palettes for the popular 4 and 12 Season systems.
Get it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.colorwise.me.allseasons
==================================

Have you been professionally analyzed, or have you analyzed yourself as a Summer on https://colorwise.me?

If so, you need this app! It helps determine which colors are right for you. It’s smart and accurate and besides, it's kind of fun to use!  Eliminate the guesswork and make wise choices when updating your wardrobe. 

Not a Summer? Find an app for your color type here: http://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7754016951728422895

Key features:
- Free Classic Summer palette featuring cool pastel colors from the 4 Season Color System
- Six premium extended palettes for the Summer sub-types, with a quick guide how to choose the one which best suits you
- Import custom palettes from your palettes collection on colorwise.me
- Smart Color Picker that automatically finds the closest colors in your palette
- Mix-and-match palette shades with actual colors
- Realistic fabric previews for all colors in the palette. 
- Works in any lighting conditions with auto white-balance and flash
- All free and premium palette colors come with names

My Summer Palette is based on the ColorBreeze system developed by the certified color analysis expert Lora Alexander. The ColorBreeze system is unique as it encompasses the basic 4 Season system, the popular 12 season system, and it offers the new, additional soft types. This makes the ColorBreeze system the most inclusive and accurate color analysis system available.

** Do you have no idea what your color type is? Lora Alexander specializes in the Virtual Color Analysis. Google "ColorBreeze" to learn more.

title: Baby Panda’s Summer: Juice Shop
description:
Search for "BabyBus" for even more free panda games for you to try! 

Are you looking for some fresh juice to quench your thirst during the long, hot summer days? Come to Baby Panda’s Juice Shop for an explosion of juice fun. The cold and flavorful fruit juice will get you feeling happy and refreshed through the summer season!

ENDLESS FRUITS FUN
Choose from a large selection of your favorite fruits and flavors to make juice for a hot summer day. What will the strawberries mixed with watermelons taste like?

CREATIVE ACTION
Make the juice just how you want! Make it differently every time! Have fun and explore! The only limits are your imagination! Your combinations will be your new summer favorite.

SIMPLE CONTROLS
Making your favorite juice has never been such easy and fun! Blend fruits, chop, and bottle all with a simple touch. Wow, it’s time to beat the heat with some cold summer juice! 

CREATIVE GAMEPLAY 
Fun and creative ways of juice production let your playing interesting at every turn! Observe customers’ reactions after finishing your special summer juice and get coins. 

KIDS-DIRECTED FUN
No rules or time limits! Make juice with your own ideas, and in your own pace.

Look! The customers are lining up and they can’t wait to buy baby panda’s fruit juice! Help baby panda prepare delicious fruit juice in the super funny Baby Panda’s Juice Shop!

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: School Girl Trip : Summer Vacation Games For Girls
description:
It’s time For Enjoying the Summer Vacation With the School Picnic Trip With High School Friends.School _Girl Maria and her friends are ready to explore the summer camp with the lots of fun and adventure activities. 

In Summer Sun Is Getting Bigger and Heat is too much Enjoy the Weather At the Beach and play with the beach sand.Make princess palace with the friends. Join the High School Girls Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for girls and boys.Spend your summer at the beach near the ocean with Summer Girl Maria and her friends in a paradise seaside resort.Here every day is a beach party! 

Help the travellers getting ready for their fun high school Girls adventure in Summer Vacation Games For Girls! Dress them up in fabulous traveling attire & accessories - they'll tell you exactly what they want to wear! There's no better way to spend a hot summer vacation traveling around the world beaches & other must seeing spots!

This summer girl went on a vacation at a camping From animal care and ocean cleanup to delicious snacks and beauty makeover, these girls have many plans for summer.

Help your mum doing the holiday laundry with all your cute summer clothes. High School Girls Camping is always a lot of fun for Summer Vacation, play in and with the nature and have fun with other Girls on the camping. Swimming in the pool, sea or a river or sunbathing. Playing outside and inside the tent and make a mess and clean it up. And of course eat a lot of ice cream! Make your own ice cream and decorate it with fruits and sprinkles.



• School Girls and friends are hungry, time to make the most popular summer holiday snacks - hot dogs! Grill sausages and heat up hot dog buns, add vegetables and sauces, and serve hot dogs to your little clients!
• Summer camp is a life out there. Do clean & Wash hair of a girl after some messy work. • Make a marshmallow sandwich with different chocolate flavors, Toppings and ice-creams.
• Do the after Summer Vacation holiday laundry: sort colors from the white clothes and use the right detergent for your pile of summer clothes laundry!
• Decorate the fancy villa where the High School girls will be staying this summer and plan a chill area with chairs and sun umbrella!
• More summer fun inside: collect summer postcards and watch summer videos
•  Visit Hair Salon for a new summer hairstyle! Wash, dry, comb, cut and curl hair to make the most beautiful haircuts and hairstyles. Dye hair in bright summer colors and decorate it with the most fashionable holiday accessories!
•  Clean up the tent: make the air mattress, put the books and cute toys back in the right place and clean the rest of the tent!
• Makeover time! Start in the Shopping Centre Games For Girls, mix and match different clothes and colors, and design the perfect Summer Vacation boat party outfit!
• High School Girl and friends are planning a Summer Vacation boat party but the ship is a mess! Clean up, wash, scrub, polish and makeover the boat, paint it pink and gold, and get ready for the best boat party before the sun goes down!

title: Summer Beach School Trip – Fun Picnic for Students
description:
Summer Beach School Trip is a fun making and student activity simulator game which is very powerful, strong & attractive teaching tool for student’s extracurricular activities enhancement. Little boys & girls to travel from one place to theme park & playground with their school friends & teachers. High school students always demand outside activities for having fun & experience and this little gathering always remembering time for them. Start your day by waking up early in the morning for school trip and taking bath for fresh look and brush your teeth. Village farm simulator will help you to learn about village life. Wear neat and clean uniform and be fast to catch your school bus for this good day trip to theme park & playground. 

School bus driver has already cleaned up & washed his bus. This will make them happy because they always make virtual plan for school trips and friends gathering. It will improve self-confidence and self-esteem in adventurous students in Summer Beach School Trip. This is really a good stage of life because this time is to cheer up and motivate students to participate in these activities to develop behavior of life far away from school enjoying ocean view building sand castle in theme park & playground. It is great reward for teachers if little boys learn from outside the school. It can reduce the anxiety level in stubborn children by visiting different places with friends and family in Summer Beach School Trip. Cook awesome food recipe in your home kitchen for summer holidays trip.

All of above wants to cherish their life with friends at good atmosphere to enhance adventures of school trip in bus. This is real time enjoyment and fun. School trip simulator is a specific kind of activity where you start learning about gathering with friends and teachers. Crazy students can also learn time management & cashier sense of cash register by playing this Summer Beach School Trip game. So start packing your important stuff for trip to the ocean side. Find the hidden objects from your home bed room before leaving for trip on high school bus simulator. Carefully place all the objects in your school backpack. Visit the nearest supermarket shop with your mommy to buy necessary ingredients for cooking at the destination after making payment to the cashier at cash register in Summer Beach School Trip. 

Make the payment to the store cashier at the cash counter and stuff all things in your car. Don’t forget to pack sunscreen and umbrella to enjoy your time at the beach. Search for hidden treasures on the seashore with your metal detector in Summer Beach School Trip. Be the awesome builder, designer and decorator to construct amazing sand castles on the beach with your high school friends. Go for swimming with the students and beat them in the swim racing in Summer Beach School Trip. Hit the coconut trees with stones to make them drop on the sand. Cut the coconuts from top to drink delicious coconut juice better than you purchased from city shopping mall. 

Download Summer Beach School Trip, a unique high school travelling simulator game of 2018.

title: Healthy Summer Food - Cooking Games for Girls
description:
Sunshine and warmer weather mean that summer is just around the corner—that amazing time of year when fresh produce abounds. In Healthy Summer Foods game we've included some foods which are good for health in the summer.

Start your day with fresh and delicious foods which gives you stamina for the full day. Eat healthy and live healthy is the motto of our game. We also think that our game will help little kids to learn about cooking and healthy foods. In game you've to cook some healthy foods for summer like Gazpacho Soup, Bruschetta, Cookie Shaved Milk Ice, Peach Cobbler and Salmon.

Features:
- Best cooking fever game for kids and girls
- There are more than 5+ different healthy summer foods to cook
- Tons of fresh and delicious ingredients to cook
- Be the best food cooking chef
- Easy to use controls to make the tasty foods
- Make yummy healthy summer foods like Gazpacho Soup, Bruschetta, Cookie Shaved Milk Ice, Peach Cobbler and Salmon with tons of ingredients
- Very Interactive and intuitive controls & graphics to play the game

This is an amazing food cooking game. Not only the children but the parents are also love this game. The brilliant graphics and beautifully simulated cooking world is going to make it more fun. Just download this game and take control of your summer food right away.

title: Bingo Quest - Summer Garden Adventure
description:
AYOH - Shout out a cheer! Bingo Quest SUMMER Garden is here!  Featuring ALL NEW artwork showcasing the beauty of the season!

Travel along the map into 4 picturesque Summer worlds. Walk through manicured flower gardens, unruly and mysterious forests, and even with the occasional beautiful beast! Are you ready to discover all that the newest Bingo Quest has to offer? 

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE BLOOMING WORLD OF BINGO QUEST - SUMMER GARDEN ADVENTURE! 
Bingo Quest Summer Garden will take you on an adventure through the hot summer sun featuring beautiful artwork and relaxing scenery. An excellent free and fun bingo game featuring offline play!


ADVENTURE THROUGH BEAUTIFUL LANDS WITH 80 LEVELS OF FREE BINGO
As you progress through our free bingo game adventure, you’ll have the chance to explore new areas in the land of four seasons.  Adore the summer birds and waterfalls along your bingo journey and, with 80 levels of free bingo waiting for you in the gardens, you’ll have hours of fun in this beautiful garden land! You can even play offline!

UNLOCK STUNNING FREE BINGO QUEST: SUMMER ADVENTURE ARTWORK
Collect puzzle pieces as you play bingo with the the summer babies – use these puzzle pieces to unlock beautifully illustrated artwork of the otherworldly garden realm. Collect graphics of detailed, beautiful gardens and flowers as you progress through the game. Can you collect them all? 

SPIN THE MAGICAL WHEEL OF FORTUNE
Every day you can visit the wheel of fortune – rumored to give those who spin it a free reward every 24 hours. Receive extra daubers, coins, keys and more, so be sure to visit every day and claim your free prize!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Fun, free bingo game for all ages

★ Change the bingo caller speed
★ Play Bingo Quest offline – no internet connection required! 

For a refreshing, fun and free bingo experience, look no further than Bingo Quest Summer Garden Adventure!. Full of beauty and adventure, you’ll have hours of fun playing bingo in the beautiful garden paradise. Why play anywhere else?

title: Summer Vacation Airport Trip: Flight Attendant
description:
Summer Vacation Airport Trip is almost here! It's time for a fun-filled day with tons of my pretend airport traveling activities. You have played & performed many hot beach activities in high school trip simulator game for girls but now is the time to travel! Dress up in stylish traveling clothing, pack your luggage maintaining space in the suitcase, find surprises while performing multiple airport activities & so much more! Summer Vacation Airport Trip will let you learn & train yourself performing all the necessary tasks so that you can find traveling pretty much easier with full of fun & adventure.

Help the travelers getting ready for their fun high school adventure in Summer Vacation Airport Trip! Dress them up in fabulous traveling attire & accessories - they'll tell you exactly what they want to wear! You can even design your own luggage bag after packing all the traveling stuff from shirts, shoes, camera & pants etc.! Grab your sports bag, rub in your sunscreen, & let's get going in this traveling simulator game for girls! There's no better way to spend a hot summer vacation traveling around the world beaches & other must seeing spots!

It is time to take over this city airport! Build your own airline, managing all the aircraft and crew. Your airport must be the best one! Plane simulation games for girls is amazing! Security check the travelers luggage through scanner carefully and remove prohibited items in Summer Vacation Airport Trip. Manage cleanliness in the waiting hall for VIP passengers. Pick up the garbage from the airport floor & put in dust bin. Check passports on the ticketing cashier counter, take money in cash currency, put in the cash register machine & issue tickets after complete boarding entry. Cook delicious foods including burgers & sandwiches in the airport kitchen lounge for guests. 

Summer Vacation Airport Trip Gameplay:

-	Be an airport scanner officer, check passenger and their luggage by X-Ray scanner, make sure no prohibited items.
-	Check Visa for everyone, the stamp will surprise you!
-	Be a pilot, fly your plane safely. Plane simulation is amazing!
-	Offer In-flight Service to every passenger.
-	Be plane / helicopter commander, managing all planes / helicopters.
-	Find customer's lost luggage.
-	You can do drawing when get an inspiration!

Find your task managing talent in Summer Vacation Airport Trip! Have fun in these airport simulation games being the best flight attendant!

title: Summer Sweet Desserts Food - Crazy Food Maker Fun
description:
Stay cool this hot summer in this fun cooking game where you can make kinds of frozen treats. 
Raspberry sorbet and ice cream sundae. Create as you like. Let’s enjoy in the late summer to have fun.

Raspberry Sorbet
Fresh raspberry sorbet in 30 minutes! A perfect frozen creamy treat for cooling down this summer!
- Add & mix as many raspberry to the blender.
- Puree the raspberry juice for better taste
- Add & mix the real ingredients: sugar, vanilla extract
- Freeze it in the ice cream machine
- Decorate in your style with tons of sprinkles, candies, fruits and so many other crazy fun decorations.
- Enjoy your own-made yummy frozen desserts.

Ice Cream Sundae
No one could refuse the yummy cool taste in the tongue in hot summer. That is ice cream sundae.
- Choose the cup you like. So many kinds of cups to choose from
- Add the ice cream to the cup. Chocolate or vanilla? Strawberry or cookie? Choose as you like
- Choose as many ice cream flavors as you like
- Add & decorate with the cream,sprinkles, fruit and so many sweeties to your ice cream sundae
- Enjoy the sweetest ice cream sundae ever.

You won’t miss this so much fun app:) 
Download it for free now.
